name: Simply Frustrating 2
description:
This is a sequel to a game that I initially made as a simple engine test. This game, the aforementioned sequel, was more of a sidescroller-design study, of me trying to make the most interesting level design possible with the least amount of mechanics possible. The result was a fun little side project.

side note:: IT TOOK ME FREAKING NINE HOURS STRAIGHT TO PORT THIS FUCKER SO PLEASE ENJOY THE ANDROID PORT.
